Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Confessions

Syntax
[Group("confessions", "Manage confessions.")]
public class SlashConfessions : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<ConfessionService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Confess(string, IAttachment?)

Sends a confession to the confession channel.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("confess", "Sends your confession to the confession channel.", true, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Confess(string confession, IAttachment? attachment = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string confession

The confession message.
IAttachment attachment

Optional attachment for the confession.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/confess lefalaf.

Type Name Description
string stringServerId

The ID of the server abusing confessions.
string how

How are they abusing confessions? Include image links if possible.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/confessions report 1234567890 They are abusing confessions.
